# Standardize icon styles across pages (2025-12-08 11:13-0500)

_**User (2025-12-08 01:50-0500)**_

Update the icon styles and usage in styleguide.md, then apply the styles to all icon and heading style pairs across all the pages. Make sure to be consistent across EVERY page. The Greenshift framework page screenshot shows a correct example, while the color system screenshot shows misalignment and incoherent styles. The styles should be as follows:

- H1 page titles get var(--color-secondary) icon with white background and a light thin border.

- Small icons inside of a callout are dark purple icon only with no border or background.

- H2 titles and icon pairs get var(--color-secondary) icon, light purple background, and no border. 

- All icons should be visually centered vertically with its title. Ensure each icon matches the titles line-height for accurate centering.

  "contents": "# Altitude Design System UI - Styleguide\n\n&gt; **Version:** Modernization 2.0  \n&gt; **Last Updated:** December 8, 2025\n\nThis document defines the visual language and component patterns used throughout the Design System documentation app. All pages should adhere to these guidelines for consistency.\n\n---\n\n## 1. Color System &amp; Theming\n\n### 1.1 Eliminate Random Colors\n❌ **DON'T:** Use arbitrary colors (orange, green, blue, purple) for decoration or to differentiate sections.\n\n✅ **DO:** Use the semantic color system consistently across all pages.\n\n### 1.2 Primary Theme (Action/Data) - Brand Color\n**Token:** &#96;var(--color-brand)&#96; (Teal - &#96;#2AAFB8&#96;)\n\nUse for:\n- Interactive elements (links, buttons, hover states)\n- **Key data values** (numbers in stats cards)\n- Active states and selections\n- Token variable names in copy buttons (via &#96;TokenCopyButton variant=\"primary\"&#96;)\n- Visual bars/indicators for spacing, progress\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Stats card value */\n.stat-value {\n  color: var(--color-brand);\n  font-weight: 700;\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 1.3 Secondary Theme (Structure) - Deep Purple\n**Token:** &#96;var(--color-secondary)&#96; (Deep Purple - &#96;#444B8C&#96;)\n\nUse for:\n- **Page header icons** (colored icon + matching border on neutral bg)\n- Section header icons (colored icon only, no background)\n- Architectural elements (layer indicators, structural diagrams)\n- Info/architecture box titles\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Page header icon box - neutral bg, colored border + icon */\n.header-icon-box {\n  background-color: var(--color-card);  /* Neutral */\n  border: 1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.3);  /* Colored border */\n  color: var(--color-secondary);  /* Colored icon */\n}\n\n/* Section header icon - colored icon only */\n.section-icon {\n  color: var(--color-secondary);  /* Just the colored icon */\n}\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 1.4 Neutral Foundation\n**Token:** &#96;var(--color-muted)&#96; (Gray - &#96;#6b7280&#96;)\n\nUse for:\n- Labels and secondary text\n- Descriptions and helper text\n- Breadcrumb links (non-current)\n- Table headers (uppercase, small)\n\n### 1.5 Background Patterns\n❌ **DON'T:** Use hardcoded hex tints like &#96;#3b82f610&#96;, &#96;#10b98115&#96;\n\n✅ **DO:** Use semantic rgba values or CSS custom properties:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Good - Brand-based tint */\nbackground-color: rgba(var(--color-brand-rgb), 0.1);\nborder: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-brand-rgb), 0.2);\n\n/* Good - Secondary-based tint */\nbackground-color: rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.05);\nborder: 1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.15);\n\n/* Acceptable - For token reference chain chips */\nbackground-color: rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.08);  /* Brand layer */\nbackground-color: rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.08);   /* Primitive layer */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 2. Typography\n\n### 2.1 Scale Selection\nAlways use the **Major Second (&#96;--ms&#96;)** scale for documentation pages to prevent jarring size jumps:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Headings */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h2--ms);   /* Page title */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h4--ms);   /* Section title */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h5--ms);   /* Subsection */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-h6--ms);   /* Card title */\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 2.2 Body Text\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Paragraph descriptions */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-body);\nline-height: var(--line-height-relaxed);\nmax-width: 65ch;\ncolor: var(--color-muted);\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 2.3 Labels &amp; Captions\n&#96;&#96;&#96;css\n/* Uppercase labels */\nfont-size: var(--font-size-caption);\ntext-transform: uppercase;\nletter-spacing: 0.05em;\ncolor: var(--color-muted);\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n---\n\n## 3. Components &amp; Patterns\n\n### 3.1 TokenCopyButton Component\n\n**Always** use &#96;&lt;TokenCopyButton /&gt;&#96; instead of displaying static CSS variable text.\n\n**Import:**\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\nimport { TokenCopyButton } from '@/components/tokens/TokenCopyButton';\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n**Variants:**\n- &#96;primary&#96; - Brand-colored background, for main token displays\n- &#96;muted&#96; - Subtle background, for inline references\n- &#96;default&#96; - Standard neutral style\n- &#96;ghost&#96; - Transparent, for minimal interference\n\n**Usage:**\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n// For token variable displays\n&lt;TokenCopyButton \n  value=\"var(--color-brand)\" \n  displayValue=\"--color-brand\" \n  variant=\"primary\" \n/&gt;\n\n// For inline references\n&lt;TokenCopyButton value=\"--spacing-4\" variant=\"muted\" /&gt;\n\n// With full var() syntax\n&lt;TokenCopyButton value={&#96;var(${token.cssVariable})&#96;} /&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.2 Page Header Pattern\n\nEvery documentation page should follow this header structure:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n&lt;div style={{ marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-8)' }}&gt;\n  {/* 1. Breadcrumbs */}\n  &lt;div style={{ \n    display: 'flex', \n    alignItems: 'center', \n    gap: 'var(--spacing-2)', \n    marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-4)' \n  }}&gt;\n    &lt;Link href=\"/tokens\" style={{ \n      fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', \n      color: 'var(--color-muted)', \n      textDecoration: 'none' \n    }}&gt;\n      Tokens\n    &lt;/Link&gt;\n    &lt;ChevronRight size={14} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n    &lt;span style={{ \n      fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', \n      color: 'var(--color-foreground)', \n      fontWeight: 500 \n    }}&gt;\n      Current Page\n    &lt;/span&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n\n  {/* 2. &lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.3 Section Header Icons\n\n**Section headers use colored icons only** - NO background, NO border.\n\n**Important:** Use &#96;alignItems: 'flex-start'&#96; with &#96;marginTop: 4&#96; on the icon to align it with the title text (not centered with the entire text block):\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n{/* Section header - colored icon only,     fontWeight: 600, \n      color: 'var(--color-foreground)' \n    }}&gt;\n      Section Title\n    &lt;/h2&gt;\n    &lt;p style={{ \n      fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body-small)', \n      color: 'var(--color-muted)' \n    }}&gt;\n      Optional section description\n    &lt;/p&gt;\n  &lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### Icon Style Summary\n\n| Location | Box Size | Background | None | None | None | 20px | &#96;var(--color-secondary)&#96; |\n| **Token chip** | Chip | Chip has tinted bg | Chip has border | 10-12px | Matches chip theme |\n\n### 3.4 Stats Cards\n\nUniform design {stat.value}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n      \n      {/* Label - Caption, Muted, Uppercase */}\n      &lt;div style={{\n        fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n        color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n        textTransform: 'uppercase',\n        letterSpacing: '0.05em',\n      }}&gt;\n        {stat.label}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  ))}\n&lt;/div&gt;\n&#96;&#96;&#96;\n\n### 3.5 Content Cards\n\nStandard card container:\n\n&#96;&#96;&#96;tsx\n&lt;div style={{\n  backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n  border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n  borderRadius: Common Patterns Checklist\n\nWhen updating a page, ensure:\n\n- [ ] **Breadcrumbs** use muted color for links, foreground for current\n- [ ] **Page icon box** is 56x56px with neutral bg, colored border + colored icon\n- [ ] **Section icons** are colored icon only (no bg, no border)\n- [ ] **Title** uses H2 size, weight 700\n- [ ] **Description** has max-width 65ch, line-height relaxed\n- [ ] **Stats cards** use brand color for values, muted for labels\n- [ ] **Token variables** use &#96;&lt;TokenCopyButton /&gt;&#96; component\n- [ ] **No hardcoded hex colors** for decorative elements\n- [ ] **Grid alignment** uses 4px/8px multiples\n- [ ] **Card containers** use &#96;var(--radius-xl)&#96; and standard border\n- [ ] **Architecture notes** use secondary color theme\n\n---\n\n## 6. Layer Color Reference\n\nFor token architecture visualization, use these consistent colors:\n\n| Layer | Color | Usage |\n|-------|-------|-------|\n| Greenshift | &#96;#06b6d4&#96; (Cyan) | Framework adapter layer |\n| Components | Brand theme | Component tokens |\n| Semantic | Brand theme | Role-based tokens |\n| Typography | Secondary theme | Type scale tokens |\n| Primitives | Secondary theme | Raw value tokens |\n\n---\n\n## 7. Icon Selection\n\nUse Lucide React icons. Common icons by page type:\n\n- **Primitives:** &#96;Hash&#96;\n- **Semantic:** &#96;Sparkles&#96;\n- **Components:** &#96;Box&#96;\n- **Typography:** &#96;Type&#96;\n- **Colors:** &#96;Palette&#96;\n- **Spacing:** &#96;Ruler&#96;\n- **Greenshift:** &#96;Globe&#96;\n\n---\n\n*This styleguide should be referenced for all new pages and when updating existing pages in the Design System documentation app.*\n",

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Now I need to understand the differences and update the styleguide and all the pages. Let me read all the other pages to see what needs to be updated. From what I can see:

1. The Greenshift page has correctly styled icons for:
   - H1 page title: 56x56 icon box with neutral bg (var(--color-card)), colored border (rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.3)), and colored icon (var(--color-secondary))
   - Section headers (H2s): They have icon + light purple background (tinted), no border, which is what user wants

2. The Colors page has:
   - H1 page title: Looks correct (56x56 box, neutral bg, colored border, colored icon)
   - "Two-Layer Architecture" section: The icon has marginTop: 12 which doesn't match the pattern
   - The H2 "Semantic Color Tokens" icon doesn't have a background

Looking at the user's requirements:
- **H1 page titles**: var(--color-secondary) icon with white background and a light thin border. ✓ Matches current
- **Small icons inside a callout**: dark purple icon only with no border or background.
- **H2 titles and icon pairs**: var(--color-secondary) icon, light purple background, and no border.
- All icons should be visually centered vertically with its title.

Let me look at the Greenshift page more closely to understand its H2 section style:

Looking at lines 871-895 of the Greenshift page:
```tsx
<div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: 'var(--spacing-4)', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-6)' }}>
  <div
    style={{
      width: 48,
      height: 48,
      borderRadius: 'var(--radius-lg)',
      backgroundColor: `${section.iconColor}15`,  // Light tinted background
      display: 'flex',
      alignItems: 'center',
      justifyContent: 'center',
      color: section.iconColor,
      flexShrink: 0,
    }}
  >
    {section.icon}
  </div>
```

I see the H2 section styling uses a specific approach for icon backgrounds. The tinted background is created by adding `15` to the icon's color, which creates a very light, translucent version of the original color. This matches the user's desire for a light purple background with no border.

The implementation ensures the icon is centered both horizontally and vertically within its container, which addresses the requirement of vertical centering with the title.

I'll review the additional pages systematically to ensure consistent icon styling across the design system. Each page will need careful examination to maintain visual coherence while implementing the new icon background approach.</details></think>

pixels: 9999 },\n  { name: 'Modal', cssVariable: '--semantic-radius-modal', reference: '2xl', resolvedValue: '1rem', pixels: 16 },\n];\n\n// =============================================================================\n// DATA - Semantic Layout Tokens\n// =============================================================================\n\nconst SEMANTIC_LAYOUT: SemanticLayoutToken[] = [\n  { name: 'Content Width', cssVariable: '--semantic-layout-contentwidth', reference: '5xl', resolvedValue: '64rem', pixels: 1024 },\n  { name: 'Wide Width', cssVariable: '--semantic-layout-widewidth', reference: null, resolvedValue: '90rem', pixels: 1440 },\n  { name: 'Prose Width', cssVariable: '--semantic-layout-prosewidth', reference: '2xl', resolvedValue: '42rem', pixels: 672 },\n];\n\n// =============================================================================\n// HELPER COMPONENTS\n// =============================================================================\n\nfunction ColorSwatchToken({ token }: { token: SemanticColorToken }) {\n  // Determine if color is light for text contrast\n  const isLightColor = (hex: string): boolean =&gt; {\n    const r = parseInt(hex.slice(1, 3), 16);\n    const g = parseInt(hex.slice(3, 5), 16);\n    const b = parseInt(hex.slice(5, 7), 16);\n    const luminance = (0.299 * r + 0.587 * g + 0.114 * b) / 255;\n    return luminance &gt; 0.5;\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div\n      className=\"color-swatch-token\"\n      style={{\n        backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n        border: '1px solid var(--color-card-border)',\n        borderRadius: 'var(--radius-lg)',\n        overflow: 'hidden',\n        transition: 'all var(--duration-150) var(--ease-out)',\n      }}\n    &gt;\n      {/* Color Preview - no buttons inside */}\n      &lt;div\n        style={{\n          height: 64,\n          backgroundColor: token.resolvedHex,\n          display: 'flex',\n          alignItems: 'flex-end',\n          padding: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n          borderBottom: token.resolvedHex === '#ffffff' ? '1px solid var(--color-card-border)' : 'none',\n        }}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;span\n          style={{\n            fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)',\n            fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace',\n            color: isLightColor(token.resolvedHex) ? 'rgba(0,0,0,0.5)' : 'rgba(255,255,255,0.8)',\n          }}\n        &gt;\n          {token.resolvedHex.toUpperCase()}\n        &lt;/span&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      {/* Token Info */}\n      &lt;div style={{ padding: 'var(--spacing-3)' }}&gt;\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-2)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', fontWeight: 600, color: 'var(--color-foreground)' }}&gt;\n            {token.name}\n          &lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n\n        {/* CSS Variable */}\n        &lt;div style={{ marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-3)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;TokenCopyButton value={&#96;var(${token.cssVariable})&#96;} displayValue={token.cssVariable} variant=\"primary\" /&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n\n        {/* Reference Chain: Value → Primitive → Semantic */}\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 'var(--spacing-1)', flexWrap: 'wrap' }}&gt;\n          {/* Raw Value */}\n          &lt;div\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n              padding: '2px 6px',\n              backgroundColor: 'var(--color-background)',\n              border: '1px solid var(--color-border)',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace', color: 'var(--color-foreground)' }}&gt;\n              {token.resolvedHex}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;ArrowRight size={10} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          {/* Primitive */}\n          &lt;div\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n              padding: '2px 6px',\n              backgroundColor: 'rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.08)',\n              border: '1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.15)',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;Hash size={10} style={{ color: 'var(--color-secondary)' }} /&gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', fontFamily: 'ui-monospace, monospace', color: 'var(--color-secondary)', fontWeight: 500 }}&gt;\n              {token.reference}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;ArrowRight size={10} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          {/* Semantic */}\n          &lt;div\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-1)',\n              padding: '2px 6px',\n              backgroundColor: 'rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.08)',\n              border: '1px solid rgba(42, 175, 184, 0.2)',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-md)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;Sparkles size={10} style={{ color: 'var(--color-brand)' }} /&gt;\n            &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-caption)', fontWeight: 500, color: 'var(--color-brand)' }}&gt;\n              Semantic\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  );\n}\n\nfunction StatusIcon({ type }: { type: string }) {\n  switch (type) {\n    case 'Success':\n    case 'Success Light':\n      return &lt;CheckCircle size={16} style={{ color: '#22c55e' }} /&gt;;\n    case 'Warning':\n    case 'Warning Light':\n      return &lt;AlertCircle size={16} style={{ color: '#f59e0b' }} /&gt;;\n    case 'Error':\n    case 'Error Light':\n      return &lt;XCircle size={16} style={{ color: '#ef4444' }} /&gt;;\n    case 'Info':\n    case 'Info Light':\n      return &lt;Info size={16} style={{ color: '#3b82f6' }} /&gt;;\n    default:\n      return null;\n  }\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// MAIN COMPONENT\n// =============================================================================\n\nexport default function SemanticTokensPage() {\n  const [expandedGroups, setExpandedGroups] = useState&lt;Set&lt;string&gt;&gt;(new Set(SEMANTIC_COLORS.map(g =&gt; g.id)));\n\n  const toggleGroup = (id: string) =&gt; {\n    const newExpanded = new Set(expandedGroups);\n    if (newExpanded.has(id)) {\n      newExpanded.delete(id);\n    } else {\n      newExpanded.add(id);\n    }\n    setExpandedGroups(newExpanded);\n  };\n\n  // Count totals\n  const totalColorTokens = PrimitiveColorsPage() {\n  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('');\n  const [selectedShade, setSelectedShade] = useState&lt;{ palette: string; shade: string; hex: string; cssVariable: string } | null&gt;(null);\n  const [copiedAll, setCopiedAll] = useState(false);\n\n  // Filter palettes based on search\n  const filteredPalettes = useMemo(() =&gt; {\n    if (!searchQuery) return COLOR_PALETTES;\n    const query = searchQuery.toLowerCase();\n    return COLOR_PALETTES.filter(\n      (p) =&gt;\n        p.name.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||\n        p.displayName.toLowerCase().includes(query) ||\n        p.shades.some((s) =&gt; s.hex.toLowerCase().includes(query))\n    );\n  }, [searchQuery]);\n\n  // Export all as CSS\n  const handleExportCSS = async () =&gt; {\n    const cssContent = COLOR_PALETTES.flatMap((palette) =&gt;\n      palette.shades.map((shade) =&gt; &#96;  ${shade.cssVariable}: ${shade.hex};&#96;)\n    ).join('\\n');\n\n    const fullCSS = &#96;:root {\\n  /* Primitive Color Tokens */\\n${cssContent}\\n}&#96;;\n\n    try {\n      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(fullCSS);\n      setCopiedAll(true);\n      setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopiedAll(false), 2000);\n    } catch (err) {\n      console.error('Failed to copy:', err);\n    }\n  };\n\n  // Handle swatch click\n  const handleSwatchClick = (palette: string, shade: string, hex: string, cssVariable: string) =&gt; {\n    setSelectedShade({ palette, shade, hex, cssVariable });\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div style={{ maxWidth: 'var(--layout-7xl)' }}&gt;\n      {/* Header */}\n      &lt;div style={{ marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-6)' }}&gt;\n        {/* Breadcrumb */}\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 'var(--spacing-2)', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;Link\n            href=\"/tokens\"\n            style={{\n              fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)',\n              color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n              textDecoration: 'none',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            Tokens\n          &lt;/Link&gt;\n          &lt;ChevronRight size={14} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          &lt;Link\n            href=\"/tokens/primitives\"\n            style={{\n              fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)',\n              color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n              textDecoration: 'none',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            Primitives\n          &lt;/Link&gt;\n          &lt;ChevronRight size={14} style={{ color: 'var(--color-muted)' }} /&gt;\n          &lt;span style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)', color: 'var(--color-foreground)', fontWeight: 500 }}&gt;\n            Colors\n          &lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n\n        &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', justifyContent: 'space-between', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}&gt;\n          &lt;div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}&gt;\n            {/* Page icon box - neutral bg, colored border */}\n            &lt;div\n              style={{\n                width: 56,\n                height: 56,\n                borderRadius: 'var(--radius-xl)',\n                backgroundColor: 'var(--color-card)',\n                border: '1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.3)',\n                display: 'flex',\n                alignItems: 'center',\n                justifyContent: 'center',\n                flexShrink: 0,\n                color: 'var(--color-secondary)',\n              }}\n            &gt;\n              &lt;Palette size={28} /&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;div&gt;\n              &lt;h1\n                style={{\n                  fontSize: 'var(--font-size-h3)',\n                  fontWeight: 700,\n                  color: 'var(--color-foreground)',\n                  marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n                }}\n              &gt;\n                Color Palettes\n              &lt;/h1&gt;\n              &lt;p\n                style={{\n                  fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body)',\n                  color: 'var(--color-muted)',\n                  lineHeight: 'var(--line-height-relaxed)',\n                  maxWidth: '65ch',\n                }}\n              &gt;\n                22 color families with 11 shades each (50-950), plus base colors. These are the raw\n                color values used by semantic tokens throughout the design system.\n              &lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n\n          {/* Export Button */}\n          &lt;button\n            onClick={handleExportCSS}\n            style={{\n              display: 'flex',\n              alignItems: 'center',\n              gap: 'var(--spacing-2)',\n              padding: 'var(--spacing-2) var(--spacing-4)',\n              backgroundColor: copiedAll ? 'var(--color-success)' : 'var(--color-brand)',\n              color: 'white',\n              border: 'none',\n              borderRadius: 'var(--radius-lg)',\n              fontSize: 'var(--font-size-label)',\n              fontWeight: 500,\n              cursor: 'pointer',\n              transition: 'all var(--duration-150) var(--ease-out)',\n            }}\n          &gt;\n            {copiedAll ? &lt;Check size={16} /&gt; : &lt;Download size={16} /&gt;}\n            {copiedAll ? 'Copied!' : 'Export CSS'}\n          &lt;/button&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n\n      {/* Stats - Unified Theme */}\n      &lt;div\n        style={{\n          display: 'flex',\n          gap: 'var(--spacing-6)',\n          marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-6)',\n          flexWrap: 'wrap',\n        }}\n      &gt;\n        {[\n          { label: 'Color Families', value: '22' },\n          { label: 'Shades per Family', value: '11' },\n          { label: 'Total Colors', value: '245' },\n          { label: 'Base Colors', value: '3' },\n        ].map((stat) =&gt; ---

I've updated the styleguide and applied consistent icon styles across all pages. Here's a summary of the changes:

## Styleguide Updates (`styleguide.md`)
Updated the icon style documentation with three clear patterns:

1. **H1 Page Title Icons**: 
   - 56×56px box
   - White background (`var(--color-card)`)
   - Light thin border (`1px solid rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.2)`)
   - Secondary colored icon (`var(--color-secondary)`)

2. **H2 Section Header Icons**:
   - 48×48px box
   - Light purple background (`rgba(68, 75, 140, 0.08)`)
   - No border
   - Secondary colored icon (`var(--color-secondary)`)
   - `alignItems: 'center'` for vertical centering

3. **Callout/Info Box Icons**:
   - Icon only (no box)
   - Secondary colored icon (`var(--color-secondary)`)
   - No background or border

## Pages Updated

| Page | Changes Made |
|------|-------------|
| `tokens/colors/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border, added H2 icon box for "Semantic Color Tokens", fixed callout icon |
| `tokens/semantic/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border, added H2 icon boxes for "Color Roles", "Radius Roles", "Layout Widths" |
| `tokens/primitives/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border, added H2 icon box for "Token Categories" |
| `tokens/spacing/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border, added H2 icon boxes for all 6 sections |
| `tokens/typography/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border, added H2 icon boxes for all 3 sections |
| `components/buttons/page.tsx` | Added complete header with H1 icon box, breadcrumbs, and H2 icon boxes |
| `components/cards/page.tsx` | Added complete header with H1 icon box, breadcrumbs, and H2 icon boxes |
| `components/inputs/page.tsx` | Added complete header with H1 icon box, breadcrumbs, and H2 icon boxes |
| `frameworks/greenshift/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border, updated H2 section icons to use consistent pattern |
| `tokens/primitives/colors/page.tsx` | Fixed H1 border and font size |

All icons are now vertically centered with their titles using `alignItems: 'center'` and consistent `lineHeight: 'var(--line-height-tight)'` on titles.

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Looking at the screenshot, the issue is with the "Primitive Color Palettes" link card. The Hash icon at line 493 is not aligned properly with the text. Looking at the "Two-Layer Architecture" callout above it (around line 403-413), it uses:

```tsx
<div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: 'var(--spacing-3)', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}>
  {/* Callout icon - just icon, no background */}
  <Palette size={20} style={{ color: 'var(--color-secondary)', flexShrink: 0, marginTop: 2 }} />
  <div>
    <h3 style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body)', fontWeight: 600, color: 'var(--color-foreground)' }}>
      Two-Layer Architecture
    </h3>
    <p style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body-small)', color: 'var(--color-muted)' }}>
      Raw values flow through primitives to semantic tokens
    </p>
  </div>
</div>
```

The "Primitive Color Palettes" link card (around line 491-502) uses:
```tsx
<div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 'var(--spacing-4)' }}>
  <Hash size={24} style={{ color: 'var(--color-secondary)' }} />
  <div>
    <h3 style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-lead)', fontWeight: 600, color: 'var(--color-foreground)', marginBottom: 'var(--spacing-1)' }}>
      Primitive Color Palettes
    </h3>
    <p style={{ fontSize: 'var(--font-size-body-small)', color: 'var(--color-muted)' }}>
      22 color families with 11 shades each (50-950) · 245 total colors
    </p>
  </div>
</div>
```

I'll adjust the styling to match the "Two-Layer Architecture" callout. Key changes include switching to `alignItems: 'flex-start'`, reducing the Hash icon size to 20, and adding a small `marginTop` to align the icon with the text more precisely. This will create visual consistency across the design components.

The icon's current vertical centering disrupts the intended layout, so I'll realign it to sit closer to the title text. By making these subtle adjustments, the card will better match the established design pattern.</details></think>

---

I can see the issue. The "Primitive Color Palettes" link card is using `alignItems: 'center'` which centers the icon with the entire text block, while the "Two-Layer Architecture" callout uses `alignItems: 'flex-start'` with a `marginTop: 2` on the icon to align it with the title text. Let me fix that:

Fixed! The "Primitive Color Palettes" link card now matches the "Two-Layer Architecture" callout alignment:

- Changed `alignItems: 'center'` → `alignItems: 'flex-start'` 
- Reduced icon size from 24 → 20px
- Added `marginTop: 2` to align the icon with the title baseline
- Added `flexShrink: 0` to prevent icon compression
- Matched the gap spacing (`--spacing-3`) and font size (`--font-size-body`) to be consistent with the callout above
